section.p:
If you have a pirate captain’s head and want to give it to the guildmaster, .
If not, read on.

‘Do you have the head of Amcha the Pirate?’ asks the guildmaster. ‘No! The what are you doing here? He is plying his evil trade in the seas to the south, and his base lies to the east of the Sorcerers’ Isle. Now go!’
